1. Verizon outage: Customers experience problems as second outage in one week, according to downdetector.com  ABC7 Los Angeles
  2. Thousands report issues with Verizon cell phone service Monday morning  NBC New York
  3. Verizon users report service issues in Chicago, 1 week after massive outage  NBC Chicago
  4. Verizon wireless customers experience second outage in one week  CBS News
  5. Verizon says issue has been resolved after thousands reported outage Monday morning  USA TODAY
